Headline: Mercedes-Benz causes chain collision involving 6 cars along Stevens Road, 2 taken to hospital
Text: Submitted by Stomper KinoThis story was submitted via Stomp App contribution.This story was submitted via Stomp App contribution.Two drivers were taken to hospital after a chain collision along Stevens Road towards Scotts Road on June 11.Stomper Kino alerted Stomp to a video of the incident that was shared on SG Road Vigilante's YouTube page.In the video, a Mercedes-Benz is seen ramming into the rear of another car which sparks the chain collision.In response to a Stomp query, the police said they were alerted to the accident at 2.34pm."Two male car drivers, aged 60 and 67, were conscious when conveyed to the hospital," a police spokesman said.Police investigations are ongoing.Get more of Stomp's latest updates by following us on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube.View the discussion thread.View the discussion thread.Download the new STOMP app today.SPH Digital News | The Straits TimesAll rights reserved | Terms & Conditions | Data Protection Policy | Advertise with usSPH Digital News / STOMP / Copyright (c) 2019 Singapore Press Holdings Ltd.
